title: UTF-8Latin Extended A

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8Latin Extended A with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details

Hex 0100-017F / Decimal 256-383 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8Latin Extended A concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8Latin Extended A effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8Latin Extended A and how to apply it in your projects.
